Text.Text: Hail, warriors.  You are the vanguard sent from Targos, are you not?
I am Ennelia, follower of Mielikki and protector of the Wild.  I am here as a scout for the Lord of Targos.  I am injured and weak, but trust that I can help you.
My companion and I found this place no more than a tenday past.  As you probably know, we alerted the Ten-Towns and then returned to continue reconnaissance...
The fortress itself lies just north and east of our current position, but they have many lookout towers and patrols along the way.  So Braston and I... *sigh*

... we snuck past two towers just east of here looking for an easier approach to the keep.  We found some sort of gate, perhaps another entrance... I don't know.  Before we could look further, we... we must have been spotted.
Suddenly this booming drum started pounding somewhere nearby.  Before we could retreat and cover our tracks a patrol was upon us.  I thought that Braston was just behind me as we fled... *sniff* ...

But I suppose he covered me.  The last I saw he was being dragged back toward the fortress.  Despite my injuries I managed to cover my tracks and take shelter here.  But my wounds are great, and I may soon be truly one with the woods.
WHY YOU - You... grrr...  Regardless of your lack of morality, I must serve the greater good.  As much as I despise the thought, I will still help you.
Thank you for your words.  We must all work together in these times.
What is it you need?

The fortress has been hastily constructed.  But although its defenses are poor, it looks like it could easily turn back any attacking force lacking siege engines.  And with Targos under siege, we can expect no such assistance.
The fortress lies north of here.  The plains leading to it are spotted with lookout towers... and the drum alarms that led to Braston's capture.

Well, I can't tell you much.  I do know that I have heard them several times now and I believe they are some sort of alarm signal.  Braston and I found one across a bridge north of here, but we didn't realize its purpose.  We should have destroyed it.
It would be wise to find and destroy all of the drums.  If you successfully infiltrate the fortress, it should make your escape much easier.
Braston?  He is a protector of the wild, like myself.  He... *sniff* ...  he ...
Oh, who am I fooling?  Braston is also my love.  I'm certain he's still alive in that horrible fortress.  But if you can, please, please save him.  I...
Oh, thank you!  Perhaps there is a chance Braston and I will be together again.
No!  I just can't believe that.  I can't.  Please tell me you don't really believe that.
I cannot be sure that it is another entrance.  There is a locked gate to the east of here.  You will need to get past two guard towers... to say nothing of how you could actually open the gate.
But if I'm not mistaken, there should be a network of goblin warrens in the area.  It's possible the horde is using them and that an entrance is behind that wall.
Certainly.  As soon as we finish talking, I will watch over you while you rest and prepare.
I don't think I can last much longer out here...   But do not concern yourself with me, your duty to the Towns is greater.
You've returned.   Thank you for healing me.  I don't know how I could have lasted out here without your help.
Hello again... *cough, cough.*  I don't think I can last much longer out here... my wounds worsen.
What?!  I may be injured, but I'm not too weak to fight!
Farewell then.
I doubt it's safe.
Greetings, warriors, how do you fare?
A spy I am, but not for the horde as you seem to imply.  I am Ennelia, follower of Mielikki and protector of the Wild.  I am here as a scout for the Lord of Targos.  I am injured, but I can help you.
Thank you so much for healing me.  I didn't think I would make it, but now I'm sure I can.

You've returned.  And by the looks of the commotion around here, I'd say you've succeeded in your mission.   I've seen many horde creatures leaving the area already.  Surely the forces of the horde will collapse without their leader and will be unable to continue attacks for the immediate future.
I see no sign of my companion, Braston.  Do you know what has happened to him?
Oh... this is terrible news.  Return to the town.  I - I will find my way there soon... *sniff*
When the drums went off, he was captured by the Horde.  I can only pray that they haven't killed him.  If he is alive in that Fortress, I beg you to free him.

You've returned.  And by the looks of the commotion around here, I'd say you've succeeded in your mission.   I've seen many horde creatures leaving the area already.  Surely the forces of the horde will collapse without their leader and will be unable to continue attacks for the immediate future.

Thank you so much for saving Braston.   You helped keep me alive, you've saved my love, and you've routed the horde.  You truly are great warriors.  I don't know if I could ever repay you, but please take this and have our blessings in your travels.
Thank you for all your help, <CHARNAME>. Good journey to you.
Indeed.  Are you one of the scouts Ulbrec spoke of?
You're probably a spy.  Why shouldn't I kill you right now?
Well met, Ennelia.  What happened to you?
We need no assistance.  Farewell.
That's horrible, Ennelia.  I'm so sorry.
You're pathetic.
That's a good idea.
More than you did for your boyfriend.
I don't really need your help, I've got enough information already.  Farewell.
Is there any help you can offer?
Rest here.  We'll do what we can.
What do you know about the horde fortress?
Do you know anything else about those drums you heard?
Tell me about Braston.
What happened to Braston?
You mentioned some sort of other entrance?
Is it possible for me to rest here?
Is it possible for me to rest here?
How bad are your wounds?
Thank you, Ennelia.  Farewell.
Is there any other help you can offer?
Many thanks, Ennelia.  Farewell.
Interesting.  Is there any other help you can offer?
Many thanks, Ennelia.  Farewell.
Ennelia, say no more.  If Braston is alive, he will be freed.
You should face facts.  If your love was taken into that fortress, your love is dead.
Of course there is.  But for now, is there any other help you can offer?
I must be going now.  Keep your hopes up, Ennelia.
Well, perhaps he does live.  If he does, he will be saved.
I have to be getting back to Targos.  Bye, Ennelia.
I do believe it, and I'm not going to let your emotions get in the way of my mission.
Listen lady, your lover is a corpse.  He's as dead as the ground you let him be captured on.
Is there anything else you can help with?
Thank you Ennelia.  Farewell.
We'll rest for eight hours.
We'll rest until we're fully healed.
Never mind.  Is there any other help you can offer?
Many thanks, Ennelia.  Farewell.
Understood.  Is there any other help you can offer?
Drink this Potion of Healing, Ennelia.  It should help your condition.
Drink this Elixir of Health, Ennelia.  It should help your condition.
Drink this Potion of Extra Healing, Ennelia.  It should help your condition.
Many thanks, Ennelia.  Farewell.
You're welcome.  Do you think you can offer any help?
I was just checking up on you.  Farewell.
You should get back to Targos.  But can you offer any help?
Drink this Potion of Healing, Ennelia.  It should help your condition.
Drink this Elixir of Health, Ennelia.  It should help your condition.
Drink this Potion of Extra Healing, Ennelia.  It should help your condition.
I was just checking in on you.  Farewell.
Is there any other help you can offer?
Farewell Ennelia.
Well enough.  Do you think you can offer any help?
I was just checking up on you.  Farewell.
Well met, Ennelia.  What happened to you?
We need no assistance.  Farewell.
Injured and weak... that's the best kind of *spy.*  Your life ends here!
Is there any other help you can offer?
That's good to hear, but we must be going.  Farewell, Ennelia.
Who is Braston?
I don't know.
He's dead.
We freed him, but we don't know what happened after that.
We freed him.  Maybe something happened, we'll go look for him.
We freed him, but he died during the escape.
We haven't freed him yet.  Wait here, we'll go take care of it.
Actually, we killed Braston.  And now we are going to kill you.
All right, safe journey, Ennelia.
Is there any other help you can offer?
Farewell, Ennelia.
Farewell, Ennelia.  Farewell, Braston.
